attributes.review: I was planning to use this app to keep up with OUR president! i found out that he is actually a racist and homophobic rapist😔😭 not only that but he actually hasn’t been building the wall that he promised to keep out all the incredibly hardworking hispanic people that keep America great😫 would not recommend this app or this country to anyone😕
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP🤬

attributes.review: II don’t know why you download this app no way you support that president he is not my president he is a president whatever type of president but honestly he’s going to go down gen Z Will take him down we are strong and we are more than one we might not have a group of security protecting us but that’s OK we got each other. Anyways THIS APP SUCKSSS ITS A SCAM
attributes.title: The app is horrible

attributes.review: i downloaded this app so i could support our amazing president and when i opened the app it kept glitching so then a warning popped up on my phone saying something about a virus from the app trump 2020!!!! it’s a scam everyone this app is only for trump to get money don’t waste ur time i currently have to get a new phone and get it fixed 😹😹🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: i downloaded this app and i instantly experienced vision loss. the more time i spent on the app the more blind i was. do not download unless you want to end up with no vision. absolutely a disgrace. this app has left me horrible, disgusted, unsatisfied, and oh yeah. BLIND! i had to have my mom type this review out! # make me be able to see again 2020
attributes.title: instantly blinded

attributes.review: okay do now get this app took weeks to download like also what’s the point of this app like no do not download it WHATSOEVER and this app takes money from you it really does and it’s annoying do not get this app trust me unless you want it to take weeks to download and steal your money but do not download this dumb app it’s not worth it
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: This app is literally doodoo water😌I CANT BELIEVE I EVEN THOUGHT ABOUT GIVING THIS APP A CHANCE💕👄❣️i can’t believe apple hasn’t taken this app down as yet. when i first opened the app i was expecting to have an educational experience about our president. Instead I got a piece of doodoo and I’m so disappointed. At the end of the day this app needs to go.
attributes.title: Someone should get this app fixed

attributes.review: I must say like some of you I once voted for Trump. I’m here to tell you to take some time and seek out unbiased resources and learn more. Apps like these make it impossible to learn about what’s actually happening in the country and rather seek to brainwash you. If you’re reading this and support Trump I beg you to learn more and consider not voting for him.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: This is one of my favorite apps ever it gives so much information and I don’t get why everyone’s hating #Trump2020
attributes.title: I love this app

attributes.review: When i first downloaded this app, porn was showing on the open screen. I have a 5 year old and she was sitting on my lap. Next, John Stamos opened my door and threw a laptop at me, and then he vaporized into a gas that smelled horrible and started screaming Nicki 2020🥰, but the orange king was nowhere in sight. How will we rely on him if his app doesn’t work. TAKE OFF APP STORE.
attributes.title: Horrible Inappropriate App

attributes.review: First of all, let’s start by saying that this app is one of the LONGEST app I’ve ever had. Literally it takes 30 MINUTES for everything to start loading. I don’t recommend this AT ALL!! This app actually took all day to load. Nobody has time for that just to find out that it takes 30 more minutes to use this app. WASTE OF TIME. DONT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
